caption: The photograph depicts an older man in profile view, focusing intently on something out of frame. He is wearing eyeglasses and a white and blue striped engineer cap. His attire includes a rugged, worn denim jacket, suggesting he might be involved in outdoor or physical work. The background has a geometric pattern with thin vertical red, white, and blue stripes, providing a vibrant contrast to his subdued denim jacket. The sunlight illuminates his face and cap, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of his clothing and skin. The overall composition emphasizes the man's facial features and attire against the colorful, patterned backdrop.
title: Resting on a bench on diller's main street, an elderly citizen surveys the passing scene.  Near Lincoln, nb.  May, 1973
